ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve got a 55 Iksar Monk myself and I ve worked extensively on her faction. FP goes up pretty slowly, but you should be able to get parts of Kelethin,
ygData.messageBody:
I've got a 55 Iksar Monk myself and I've worked extensively on her faction. FP goes up pretty slowly, but you should be able to get parts of Kelethin, Felwithe, and Kaladim fairly easily if you're willing to kill lots of newbie mobs and take some risks to do turn ins. I'm about to start on the Kaladim rogue and pally guilds next with her. Make friends with druids and high level chanters for working on this...wolf form and project illusion are your friends.
----- Original Message -----
From: Wulfric Rennison
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 14, 2004 6:49 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Faction

As far as I know, there is no way to check faction.  I've asked this same question before.  Even gone so far as to send/feedback about it in game that there needs to be some way of checking.  You just kind of learn as you go along I guess.  Needless to say, as an Iksar your faction probably will suck in most places outside of Kunark, and even some places INSIDE Kunark since the Iksars and the Sarnaks are against each other.  And if you ever want to get into Freeport you gotta kill more orcs than you'd ever care to.    Most of the time, if there's a quest you want to do, you can find it on Casters Realm or Allakhazam's and they'll give you a faction fixing guide  in order to do the quest. 
 
 
Good luck.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Barry Stockinger
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, June 13, 2004 6:38 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Faction

Is there some way to see my faction scores?

How can I tell what faction somebody is?  I see a guard and he does
not like me, how do I know what faction I need to raise to impress
him?

I am an Iksar Swiftail Monk (yeah, question 2 comes up a lot) and I
just completed a quest.  It told me my faction with the Swiftails
increased.  Is that any good for anything?  They already think of me
amiably, can it get any better?

Are there ever faction changes you are not told about?  When I kill
some creatures there is no message about a faction change, is it
possible one happened anyway?

Thanks!

---

Izanagi, Swiftail Monk "I one day hope to master the art of standing
without moving my tail."
